unstructured_field_rules.text: The UBL team uploads a bulk file containing all necessary details such as outlet codes, contact information, and any other required data.
The system validates the uploaded file for completeness.
Below are the data point mentioned for the file upload format -
Outlet Code Entry:  The SPOC enters the Outlet Code, which is validated by the Manch system against the code associated with the generated link.
Upon accessing the link, the SPOC is prompted to agree to the data privacy policy and terms of conditions.
Note: The wording of the terms of conditions and data privacy policy is provided by the UB team.
Note: Details will change based on the answer given by SPOC and validated by MANCH with the system data.
Below table represent the dropdown values of questionnaires asked in SPOC screen.
Assignment to Approver: Once all the mandatory fields are entered, validated, and the request is submitted, the system automatically assigns the request to the appropriate approver.
The approver clicks the link to access all request details and can either approve or reject the request based on the provided information.
Respond to mandatory question: TSE answers the mandatory question: "Are you approving this request?" by selecting either "Yes" or "No" from the dropdown menu.
If TSE clicks "Reject," they select a rejection reason from a dropdown (configured based on UB rejection reasons) and submit it. The request returns to the SPOC for necessary modifications.
Respond to mandatory question: ASM answers the mandatory question: "Are you approving this group construct?" by selecting either "Yes" or "No" from the dropdown menu.
affected_fields: Are you approving this group construct?

unstructured_field_rules.text: If ASM clicks "Reject," they select a rejection reason from a dropdown (configured based on UB rejection reasons) and submit it. The request returns to the SPOC for necessary modifications.
Respond to mandatory question:
UB approver answers the mandatory question: "Are you approving this request?" by selecting either "Yes" or "No" from the dropdown menu.
UB approver answers the mandatory question: "Are you approving this group KYC?" for group owner level by selecting either "Yes" or "No" from the dropdown menu.
affected_fields: Are you approving this group KYC?

unstructured_field_rules.text: UB approver answers the mandatory question: "Are you approving this group member document?" for each group member level by selecting either "Yes" or "No" from the dropdown menu.
affected_fields: Are you approving this group member document?

unstructured_field_rules.text: If UB approver clicks "Reject," they select a rejection reason from a dropdown (configured based on UB rejection reasons) and submit it. The request returns to the SPOC for necessary modifications.
One report will be generated by Manch for this process report format will be finalized with UB team, after process finalization.
Confirmation on filed level information for SPOC and approver level
Need information of UB team members
